scripts.docker:seed: docker-compose exec backend npm run seed
scripts.docker:db-connect: docker-compose exec postgres psql -U pilates_user -d pilates_studio_dev
scripts.setup:dev: cp backend/.env.example backend/.env && echo 'Environment file created'
scripts.setup:ssl: mkdir -p nginx/ssl && openssl req -x509 -nodes -days 365 -newkey rsa:2048 -keyout nginx/ssl/key.pem -out nginx/ssl/cert.pem -subj '/C=TR/ST=Istanbul/L=Istanbul/O=PilatesStudio/CN=localhost'
scripts.health:check: curl -f http://localhost:3000/health || echo 'Backend is not healthy'
